A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had such a bad feeling when I found out Disney bought the franchise. This movie is a disgrace to everything I grew up loving and watching as a kid. The plot was recycled Star Wars and was probably doomed from the get go with some of the cast selections. How there dissolving Luke\, Han for example is ridiculous. For that matter\, The movies always and should carry a suspense\, seriousness and tone that says\, “wow that’s a Star Wars movie”. These new films and especially this one is a joke. Humor that makes no sense for it to be in this film with a regurgitated plot. Horrible.
